schema.description: Request to create a SIEM destination.

circuit_breaker_cooldown_secs.description: Seconds to wait before retrying after circuit breaker opens.

circuit_breaker_threshold.description: Number of consecutive failures before circuit breaker opens.

endpoint_host.description: Hostname or IP of the destination.

event_type_filter.description: Event types to export (JSON array of category strings, empty = all).

queue_buffer_size.description: Queue buffer size for delivery resilience.

rate_limit_per_second.description: Max events per second to this destination.

schema.title: CreateSiemDestinationRequest
